text: ane ame temani pachala marayamana putra isa (a.Sa.) Ne mokalya, je potana pahelani kitaba etale ke tauratani pusti karanara hata ane ame temane injila api, jemam prakasa ane satya margadarsana hatum ane te (injila) potana pahelani kitaba tauratani pusti karati hati ane te spasta sikhamana ane satya margadarsana hatum, daravavala'o mate
